attributes.action: Re open the Railway Line from Stoke-on-Trent  Staffordshire to Alton Towers.
attributes.additional_details: Some of the Railway is Still in Place and is operated by Churnet Valley Railway which is used by a lot of Tourists
attributes.background: My Background is I Have Worked on the Railway for 18 years and I Find if this Railway is opened it will ceate jobs and boost the Economy for Stoke-on-Trent and cut Down on Traffic through Alton and make a better transport service into Alton Towers.
